mobile.name: judge adjudicator
mobile.long_description: An adjudicator is watching the games intently.
mobile.description: The adjudicator is a retired gladiator and scars cover all exposed parts of his body. Although he is getting on in years, he remains healthy and fit.

mobile.name: scorekeeper
mobile.long_description: A scorekeeper has one eye on his stopwatch and the other on a clipboard.
mobile.description: The scorekeeper is a young man of about 25 years of age and is very intently studying his clipboard.

mobile.name: spectator fan
mobile.long_description: A spectator is here watching the games.
mobile.description: The spectator is filthy, half drunk and screaming his head off.

mobile.name: noble nobleman
mobile.long_description: A nobleman stands here looking aloof.
mobile.description: The nobleman is dressed in fine clothes and jewelry and has a very snobbish attitude. While he is getting old and his hair and beard are streaked with gray, he is by no means an easy target.

mobile.name: slave
mobile.long_description: A slave stands here, wishing that she was free.
mobile.description: A very pretty young woman who was captured instead of being killed when the Roman legions subjugated her land.

mobile.name: gladiator
mobile.long_description: There is a gladiator standing here.
mobile.description: A well muscled man who is very heavily armored and armed to the teeth. He lives for combat.

mobile.name: driver
mobile.long_description: There is a chariot driver here.
mobile.description: You see a very slight and small individual whose whole life is centered around nothing but horses and speed.

mobile.name: coach trainer
mobile.long_description: There is a coach standing here, going over last minute strategy.
mobile.description: As you try to look over his shoulder and listen in on his mumbling, he looks up at you and gives you a glare that chills you to the bone.

mobile.name: healer
mobile.long_description: A healer is standing here.
mobile.description: You see a young man, still learning about magical healing, wearing a white coat and using a stethoscope.

mobile.name: herbalist young lady beautiful
mobile.long_description: There is a beautiful young lady here, carrying herbs to help the healer with.
mobile.description: The herbalist is a very beautiful young lady who is about 22 years old. She has deep brown eyes and shoulder-length chestnut hair. Her body is perfectly proportioned and she stands about 5' 5" tall.

mobile.name: shopkeeper
mobile.long_description: Titus' shopkeeper is here, minding the store.
mobile.description: The shopkeeper is an older man in his middle to late fifties and looks like he enjoys the quiet life. There is a long scar running from the edge of his mouth to his right ear, making it look like he is always smiling.

mobile.name: peddler
mobile.long_description: A poor peddler is standing here, trying to support his meager existence.
mobile.description: You see a small, dirty man who doesn't look very healthy.

mobile.name: page
mobile.long_description: A page stands here, waiting to run an errand.
mobile.description: You see a young boy who looks very strong and very fast. He has the look of a scholar about him.

mobile.name: plaintiff
mobile.long_description: The plaintiff stands here, pleading his case.
mobile.description: He looks pitiful. Absolutely pitiful.

mobile.name: master
mobile.long_description: A ticket master is here, looking at you expectantly.
mobile.description: He seems to be waiting for you to either buy a ticket or to get out of his way so that he can sell tickets to people that actually want them.

mobile.name: vendor
mobile.long_description: A stadium vendor is walking here, selling overpriced hotdogs and beer.
mobile.description: The vendor is a scruffy looking man who isn't afraid of a fight and looks like he has had just about enough of smart-mouthed spectators.

mobile.name: citizen
mobile.long_description: A citizen of Rome is standing here.
mobile.description: It appears to be your ordinary citizen going about his business.

mobile.name: gateguard guard
mobile.long_description: A gateguard stands here, tending the gate.
mobile.description: You see a strong, loyal public defender.

mobile.name: soldier
mobile.long_description: A soldier on leave is walking around looking for entertainment.
mobile.description: You see a member of one of the Emperor's elite legions. He looks VERY strong. You have this vague feeling that his entertainment isn't going to be a very wholesome activity.

mobile.name: emperor julius caesar
mobile.long_description: Julius Caesar, the Emperor of Rome, is sitting here.
mobile.description: You see a man who is dressed in the finest of clothes, has eaten the best of foods and lived in the most opulent palace that Rome has ever known.

mobile.name: guard royal bodyguard
mobile.long_description: There is a royal bodyguard here, ready to die for the Emperor, if necessary.
mobile.description: The bodyguard is dressed in the finest of armor and wields only the deadliest of weapons. He is very strong and would put up one hell of a fight. He has been trained to be suspicious of all but the most innocent visitors, and likely to take offense of anyone with less than pure intentions.

mobile.name: judge justice
mobile.long_description: A judge is standing here, reading a case.
mobile.description: He seems to be quite interested in the case, perhaps you shouldn't disturb him now, later would probably be a better time.

mobile.name: master scheduler
mobile.long_description: The master scheduler is here, writing in an appointment book.
mobile.description: As you look at him, he looks up at you and asks, 'Do you have an appointment?' He waits for a few seconds and then asks, 'Would you like one?'

mobile.name: slimeball slime ball green
mobile.long_description: A green ball of slime is hanging over you, oozing downward.
mobile.description: There is a green 'ball' of slime oozing from the coating on the walls.

mobile.name: froboz wizard
mobile.long_description: Froboz the wizard is standing here, working on a new spell.
mobile.description: You see a middle-aged man whose knowledge of magic, both offensive and defensive, is legendary. He literally glows with a pink aura.

mobile.name: titus andronicus
mobile.long_description: Titus Andronicus is standing here, polishing a few swords.
mobile.description: As you look at him, he suddenly swings a newly sharpened sword at you! Watch out!

mobile.name: senator
mobile.long_description: A senator is here, waiting for debate to begin.
mobile.description: He seems to be quite bored and is playing with the edge of his toga.

mobile.name: bailiff
mobile.long_description: The bailiff stands here, keeping order in the courtroom.
mobile.description: He is a very stern man and insists on absolute quiet in his courtroom unless the judge has given someone permisson to speak.

mobile.name: defendant
mobile.long_description: The defendant stands here, pleading her case.
mobile.description: She looks to be well organized and full of confidence.

mobile.name: jupiter king god
mobile.long_description: Jupiter, King of the Gods, is watching over his realm here.
mobile.description: He is the strongest of the Gods, and certainly no easy mark! His powers transcend the plane of the physical, and could easily kill an unprepared mortal.

mobile.name: venus goddess
mobile.long_description: Venus, the Goddess of Beauty and Knowledge, is resting here.
mobile.description: Venus is probably one of the most beautiful women you have ever seen if not THE most beautiful. She is very powerful and tough under that outer image of beauty.

mobile.name: mars god
mobile.long_description: Mars, the God of War and State, is sitting down here.
mobile.description: Mars is a tall God with burning, hateful eyes and a large scowl on his face.

mobile.name: mercury messenger god
mobile.long_description: Mercury, the messenger of the Gods, is standing here.
mobile.description: Mercury is a handsome, youthful God and wears a large grin on his face.

mobile.name: shopkeeper
mobile.long_description: Froboz' shopkeeper is here, minding the store.
mobile.description: The shopkeeper is an older man in his middle to late fifties and looks like he enjoys the quiet life. There is a long scar running from the edge of his mouth to his right ear, making it look like he is always smiling.

mobile.name: executioner
mobile.long_description: The executioner stands here, waiting to torture some sorry soul.
mobile.description: You see a burly man who is wearing a black hood that obscures his face. He has a very sadistic attitude and clearly loves his work.

mobile.name: baker
mobile.long_description: The baker looks at you calmly, wiping flour from his face with one hand.
mobile.description: A fat, nice looking baker. But you can see that he has many scars on his body.

mobile.name: grocer
mobile.long_description: A grocer stands at the counter, with a slightly impatient look on his face.
mobile.description: A tall grocer, who moves two 200 pounds bag of flour around on his shoulders.
